amendment.description: An amendment numbered 131 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to prohibit the use of funds to implement or enforce the decision entitled "Cemex Construction Materials Pacific, LLC.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A073) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A073) Agreed to by voice vote.
